result.execSummary:
The defendant Judith M Steckbauer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Judith M Steckbauer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Judith M Steckbauer was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sheriff Dept - Personal
Copy mailed to defendant
On def's failure to pay the fine, Court orders 10 days jail.

Defendant Judith M Steckbauer in court with attorney Alec Phillip Nocco.  Defendant Judith M Steckbauer in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 14CF244, 14CF233 amd 14CF242.  on 14CF309 court will adj 9-15-15 at 2:30 pm.  Waiver of preliminary hearing 14CF233 and 14CF244.  Def wishes to waive preliminary hearing.  Court reviews right to preliminary hearing.  Court will accept waiver of preliminary hearing.  Informations filed for 14CF233 & 14CF244.  Plea agreement in letter, stated on record by DA  14CF233 plea to ct 1 & 2 probation.  14CF242 Plea ct 1  and Ct 2 dismissed Fine plus cost.  14CF244 Plea Ct 2, Probation.  Ct 2 dismiss.  14CF202 Plea ct 2 Probation and ct 1 dismissed.  Counsel and def agree to plea agreement.   14CF244 Ct 2 bail jump No contest plea.  Court will dismiss Ct 1.  14CF233 No contest plea to Ct 1 & 2  14CF202 Ct 2 No contest plea.  CT 1 dismissed by court.  14CF242 Ct 1 No contest plea.  Court will dismiss Ct 2. Court reviews the elements of charges.  Plea advisement form reviewed.  Constitutional rights and right to jury trial reviewed.  Court finds def understands charges, penalties and right.  Factual basis in complaints.  Court will accepts plea, found guilty.   Nothing further by State.  Statement by Atty Noco.  14CF244 1 day credit.  Any cash bond posted will be applied to fine and cost.   Brief statement by def. State request def report to jail  Court will accept plea agreement.  14CF233 Ct 1 Sentence withheld 1 yr probation  Counseling and court cost.  No contact with TCR DOB 5-27-2000.  14CF242  Ct 1 Fine $100.00 plus cost.   14CF244 Ct 2 Sentence withheld, 1 yr probation  Cost only.  45 days jail commencing today.  14CF202 Ct 2 Sentence withheld, 1 yrs probation.   Counseling as recommended.  Cost.  14CF244 1 day credit if revoked.   Requesting huber.  Court will grant huber.  Felony rights reviewed, firearms and voting rights.  DNA sample.  On felony counts DNA surcharge.    If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.   Victim rights have been complied with.  Payment plan for 14CF242.  Post convictions rights.  14CF233 Same sentence on count 2

Defendant Judith M Steckbauer in court with attorney Alec Phillip Nocco.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 14CF202, 14CF244, 14CF242, 14CF233 @ 10:39 a.m. Matter being adjourned.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Attorney Alec Phillip Nocco in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 14CF2002, 14CF233, 14CF242 & 14CF244  @ 2:42 pm.  Atty Nocco request matter to be adjourned. Citation to follow 14FO309.  Status conference scheduled for March 30, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Judith M Steckbauer in court with attorney Alec Phillip Nocco.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls14CF202, 14CF233, 14CF242, 14CF244 @ 9:12 am.  Atty Nocco is appearing for initial on all case except for 14CF202 & has copy of criminal complaints, waives reading, reserve rights, waives time limits. State gives bond recommendation in 14CF233, Court orders $500.00 signature bond, no driving w/o valid d.l. 14FO309 Enters Not Guilty, Court enters & follow criminal case.  Status conference scheduled for January 26, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Clerk's Minutes filed.  See 14-CF-244 for bond.
